name: Thee Dark Ages
description:
In Thee Dark Ages, you play as a knight who has to protect a farmer from bandits! But, these bandits have bows and the farmer runs from You!

Controls:

WASD or Arrow Keys to move.  

Space to quickly play, pause, resume, or restart. (You can also use the Escape key to pause)

If  there are any bugs, please let me know in the comments.
